description: Bowl, ceramic, Chinese Export XVIIIc cat. card dims H 1-3/4' diam 8-5/8'; NO PHOTO ON CAT. CARDS; listed as 'soup plate'
object_name: Soup plate with Meissen-style harbor scene
text: This soup plate, possibly made for the Dutch market, carries a central scene of ships in a harbor, surrounded by scrolls and diapered panels similar to those produced at Meissen.
title: Soup plate with Meissen-style harbor scene
